page.title: 11STONEY STREET-A SURVEY
page.content: {RESULT OF A SURVEY BY 1J/2J} Road width varied from{3.3m}to{6.6m.} 13 houses, 3 bungalows and 3 farms. Chapel, where a stream flows under the road, now a workshop for{RURAL CRAFTS} On the remaining runway of the wartime airfield is a{LORRY DRIVING TEST AREA} and three hangars used for storage. Poultry farm belonging to{SUN VALLEY. A public house, THE COMET. 1 derelict cottage and a farmhouse being renovated. A{SATELLITE EARTH STATION.} {WORMHILL FARM MUSEUM} We found it to be a busy road with lorries, cars, vans and tractors using it. Along the road we found the usual wildflowers and birds. {Compiled by - Alan, David, Simon,Kara, {Grace, Victoria, Margaret, Rebecca, {Janet, Sharon. } KINGSTONE HIGH SCHOOL
